professional_summary: Business Analyst with experience in project management, data integration, and HR reporting. Skilled in SQL, Business Intelligence tools, and providing actionable insights for retail and HR analytics.

key_responsibilities: and administration of Retail Sales and HR data into the Zeroed in dashboard.
Reduced the number of push reports by 80% in Retail and 30% in Corporate.
Provided reporting and business insights for Retail teams across 600 locations.
Created models to analyze trends in email participation and donation patterns using IBM SPSS.
Implemented custom email campaigns based on data attributes.
Transitioned email and donation data across T-SQL and Amazon Redshift systems.
